TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CodeDomComponentSerializationService extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService
Public NotInheritable Class CodeDomComponentSerializationService Inherits ComponentSerializationService

summary.span: 序列化元件集合至序列化存放區。

span.span: Serializes a set of components into a serialization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會將一組元件或可序列化的物件序列化為序列化存放區。The class serializes a set of components or serializable objects into a serialization store. 存放區然後可以在稍後還原序列化。The store can then be deserialized at a later time. 類別與其他序列化配置的序列化格式是不透明的並且允許部分序列化的物件。The class differs from other serialization schemes in that the serialization format is opaque, and it allows for partial serialization of objects. 例如，您可以選擇只選取的屬性的物件進行序列化。For example, you can choose to serialize only selected properties for an object. 基底類別， ，取代介面從.NET Framework 1.0 版中，雖然後者保留回溯相容性。The base class, , replaces the interface from the .NET Framework version 1.0, although the latter is retained for backward compatibility. 類別未實作介面，但如果您查詢、橋接器機制，以確保回溯相容性。The class does not implement the interface, but if you query for , the provides a bridge implementation to ensure backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化存放區可以傳遞給任何方法來建置一整組物件的序列化狀態。The serialization store can be passed to any of the methods to build up serialization state for a group of objects.

summary.span: 還原序列化指定的 至指定的容器，可以選擇性地套用預設屬性值。

span.span: Deserializes the given to the given container, optionally applying default property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法還原序列化指定的存放區，但存放區中的資料而不是產生新的物件，套用至現有的一組物件取自`container`參數。The method deserializes the given store, but rather than producing new objects, the data in the store is applied to an existing set of objects that are taken from the `container` parameter. 如此一來，呼叫端可以事先建立物件但得以透過適當。As a result, the caller can create in advance an object however it sees fit. 如果物件已還原序列化狀態物件的名稱不在現有物件的集合中，將會建立新的物件。If an object has deserialization state and the object is not named in the set of existing objects, a new object will be created. 如果該物件也會實作，它就會加入至指定的容器。If that object also implements , it will be added to the given container. 在容器中的物件必須具有名稱和物件的序列化存放區中要使用現有的物件相符的型別。Objects in the container must have names and types that match objects in the serialization store in order for an existing object to be used.

exception.span: 或 為 。

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 不是支援的序列化存放區類型。

span.span: is not a supported type of serialization store.

exception.span: 請使用 傳回的存放區。

span.span: Use a store returned by .

summary.span: 在指定的物件上將指定的成員序列化。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以多次叫用來建立一份已序列化的序列化存放區中的成員相同的物件。This method can be invoked multiple times for the same object to build up a list of serialized members within the serialization store. 成員通常必須是屬性或事件。The member generally has to be a property or an event.

Public Overrides Sub SerializeMemberAbsolute (store As SerializationStore, owningObject As Object, member As MemberDescriptor)

public: override void SerializeMemberAbsolute(System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::SerializationStore ^ store, System::Object ^ owningObject, System::ComponentModel::MemberDescriptor ^ member);

span.span: The to which member will be serialized.
The object that owns the member.
The given member.

summary.span: 將指定物件上的指定成員序列化，但若其包含預設屬性值，就也會將該成員序列化。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object, but also serializes the member if it contains the default property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些成員，包含預設屬性值和相同的值設定至該成員是不同的概念。For some members, containing the default property value and setting the same value back to the member are different concepts. 比方說，如果屬性繼承其值從父物件，如果未不設定任何本機的值，設定至屬性的值可能無法預期。For example, if a property inherits its value from a parent object if no local value is set, setting the value back to the property may not be what is desired. 方法列入考量，並會在此情況下清除屬性的狀態。The method takes this into account and would clear the state of the property in this case.

exception.span: 或 是 。
